name: LCI Industries
description: LCI Industries, formerly known as Lippert Components, Inc., is a leading supplier of engineered components for the recreational vehicle (RV) and adjacent industries. Founded in 1956, the company has established a strong reputation for innovation, quality, and customer service. LCI Industries designs and manufactures a diverse range of products including axles, frames, suspension systems, and slide-out mechanisms, which enhance the performance and comfort of RVs. Additionally, LCI provides a wide array of aftermarket products and accessories that cater to the needs of RV enthusiasts. The company's commitment to research and development has led to the introduction of cutting-edge technologies that improve the user experience and safety of recreational vehicles. With a focus on sustainability, LCI Industries is also actively exploring ways to reduce its environmental impact through efficient manufacturing processes and the use of eco-friendly materials. Headquartered in Elkhart, Indiana, LCI operates numerous manufacturing facilities across the United States and has a growing presence internationally. The company’s mission is to provide innovative solutions that enhance the enjoyment of outdoor lifestyles for its customers, while also delivering strong financial performance and value to its shareholders.
